definition: variant of 投繯|投缳[tou2 huan2]
to cast/to send/to throw oneself (into the river etc)/to seek refuge/to place oneself into the hands of
ring/hoop/loop/(chain) link/classifier for scores in archery etc/to surround/to encircle/to hem in

sentences.english: The player stared at the board in a dazed way.
sentences.chinese: 投环的人目瞪口呆地盯住木板看。

definition: to cut the corpse of a criminal into pieces
traitor minister and corrupt official (idiom); abuse and corruption
to think nothing of doing sth (idiom)/to do sth without considering the risks/to leave out of consideration
to counsel a superior in tears indicating absolute sincerity
to hang oneself/to commit suicide by hanging
lit. to look for holes, and observe gaps (idiom)/fig. to search out one's opponent's weak points/to look for the Achilles' heel
